metadata.title: CVE-2022-1679 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s Atheros wirelessadapter driver in the way a user forces the ath9k_htc_wait_for_targetfunction to fail with some input messages. This flaw allows a local user tocrash or potentially escalate their privileges on the system.
